text: allaha ta'ala eka udaharananum varnana kare che ke, bijani maliki hethala eka dasa che, je ko'i vatano adhikara nathi dharavato ane eka bijo vyakti che, jene ame potani pasethi purati roji api che, jemanthi te chupi rite tatha jahera rite dana kare che, sum a badha sarakham ho'i sake che? Allaha ta'ala mate ja badhi prasansa che, parantu temana manthi vadhare padata loko janata nathi
